field_description: TCGA project name abbreviation
<'TCGA Case Barcode <https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Encyclopedia/pages/TCGA_Barcode/>' unique per patient
HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). "Unknown" is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene
Stable Ensembl ID of affected gene
Ensembl ID of the transcript affected by the variant
The Ensembl protein identifier of the affected transcript
Translational effect of variant allele
Type of mutation (SNP DNP TNP ONP INS DEL or Consolidated)
The affected chromosome (chr1)
Lowest numeric position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence
Highest numeric genomic position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence
Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 1.
The plus strand reference allele at this position. Includes the deleted sequence for a deletion or "-" for an insertion
Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 2.
The variant allele used to calculate the consequence
The SIFT prediction and/or score
The PolyPhen prediction and/or score
Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes
Global Allele Frequency from ExAC
Only given if the variation affects the protein-coding sequence
Relative position of base pair in coding sequence
Relative position of affected amino acid in protein
The rs-IDs from the dbSNP database "novel" if not found in any database used
column3: or null if there is no dbSNP record
column4: but it is found in other databases
